com.sap.cloud.sdk.cloudplatform.connectivity

Interface OAuth2Service

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XsuaaService

    @Beta
public interface OAuth2Service
    This interface handles the communication with an OAuth2 service.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccessToken retrieveAccessTokenViaClientCredentialsGrant(OAuth2ServiceSettings authorizationServerSettings, Credentials credentials, boolean useProviderTenant)
      Retrieves an AccessToken for a given pair of client credentials.
      AccessToken retrieveAccessTokenViaJwtBearerGrant(OAuth2ServiceSettings authorizationServerSettings, Credentials credentials)
      Retrieves an AccessToken for the currently active user token and the client id.

    • Method Detail

      • retrieveAccessTokenViaClientCredentialsGrant

        @Nonnull
AccessToken retrieveAccessTokenViaClientCredentialsGrant(@Nonnull
                                                                  OAuth2ServiceSettings authorizationServerSettings,
                                                                  @Nonnull
                                                                  Credentials credentials,
                                                                  boolean useProviderTenant)
        Retrieves an AccessToken for a given pair of client credentials.
        Parameters:
        authorizationServerSettings - The settings for the Authorization Server.
        credentials - The client credentials to retrieve the token for.
        useProviderTenant - Boolean flag to control usage of provider tenant context. The value true will directly use the provider tenant, whereas the value false will use the currently available Tenant as provided by the TenantAccessor.getCurrentTenant().
        Returns:
        The AccessToken for the given client credentials
        Throws:
        TokenRequestFailedException - When the token cannot be requested or correctly parsed.
        TokenRequestDeniedException - When the authorization for the token request was rejected.

      • retrieveAccessTokenViaJwtBearerGrant

        @Nonnull
AccessToken retrieveAccessTokenViaJwtBearerGrant(@Nonnull
                                                          OAuth2ServiceSettings authorizationServerSettings,
                                                          @Nonnull
                                                          Credentials credentials)
        Retrieves an AccessToken for the currently active user token and the client id.
        Parameters:
        authorizationServerSettings - The settings for the Authorization Server.
        credentials - The client id is part of the credentials.
        Returns:
        The AccessToken for the active user token received from the given OAuth2 service.
        Throws:
        TokenRequestFailedException - When the token cannot be requested or correctly parsed.
        TokenRequestDeniedException - When the authorization for the token request was rejected.
        AuthTokenAccessException - When the authorization token cannot be accessed.
        See Also:
        Cloud Foundry UAA JWT Bearer Token Grant
